installer.title: Floorp-installation
installer.description: Installer Floorp-browseren og få en privatlivsfokuseret, hurtig og tilpasningsvenlig browseroplevelse.
installer.adminRightsEnabled: Installer for alle brugere med administratorrettigheder.
installer.adminRightsDisabled: Installer kun for den aktuelle bruger.

exitConfirmation.title: Cancel Installation?
exitConfirmation.message: Canceling the installation process will prevent Floorp from being installed.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Floorp is designed with user privacy as the top priority. Protect your online privacy with tracking prevention features and secure browsing mode.

performance.title: Fast Performance
performance.description: Optimized engine provides speed for everything from page loading to tab switching, making your browsing experience smooth.

customization.title: Rich Customization
customization.description: Floorp offers rich customization options. You can customize everything from the user interface to features to suit your preferences.

extensions.title: Extensive Extensions
extensions.description: Compatible with Firefox extensions, allowing you to add your favorite tools and services to your browser.

multiplatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiplatform.description: Available on various platforms including Windows, macOS, and Linux. Enjoy the same experience everywhere.

success.downloaded_dev_mode: Floorp installer has been downloaded (development mode)

errors.signature_verification_failed: Installer signature verification failed. Execution aborted for security reasons.
errors.signature_verification_error: Der opstod en fejl under signaturbekræftelse: {{0}}
errors.installer_execution: Der opstod en fejl under kørsel af installationen: {{0}}
errors.browser_not_found: Floorp-browser ikke fundet. Installationen lykkedes, men den eksekverbare browser kunne ikke findes.
errors.admin_rights_denied: Administratorrettigheder blev nægtet. Du valgte administratorrettighedstilstand, men tilladelse blev nægtet.
errors.exit_code_not_found: Kunne ikke hente installationens exit-kode. Administratorrettigheder er muligvis blevet nægtet.
errors.user_installer_launch: Kunne ikke starte installationsprocessen med brugerrettigheder: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_execution: Der opstod et problem under kørsel af installationen med brugerrettigheder: {{0}}
